author: Caroline Vale
title: Aten√ß√£o aos sintomas iniciais de c√¢ncer de intestino que a maioria enfrenta
text:
A incid√™ncia do c√¢ncer de intestino, ou c√¢ncer colorretal, tem crescido entre a popula√ß√£o no geral, sendo esse o segundo tipo de tumor que mais mata no mundo, com mais de um milh√£o de √≥bitos anualmente, conforme dados da Organiza√ß√£o Mundial da Sa√∫de ( OMS ).
Em todo o mundo, o n√∫mero de jovens com c√¢ncer de intestino tem aumentado significativamente - Dr_Microbe/istock Esse tipo de c√¢ncer pode se desenvolver no c√≥lon (intestino grosso) ou no reto. Inicialmente, a doen√ßa surge como um p√≥lipo n√£o cancer√≠geno no revestimento interno desses √≥rg√£os, que pode evoluir para um tumor maligno.
O principal desafio no tratamento √© justamente o diagn√≥stico precoce, j√° que seus sinais podem levar tempo para aparecer.
Fatores de risco do c√¢ncer de intestino Entre os fatores de risco, encontram-se componentes gen√©ticos, doen√ßas inflamat√≥rias intestinais, tabagismo, obesidade, sedentarismo e idade avan√ßada.
Al√©m disso, pesquisadores da Universidade de Harvard (EUA) conduziram uma an√°lise que ressaltou a influ√™ncia da alimenta√ß√£o no aumento do risco de c√¢ncer colorretal. Eles conclu√≠ram que o aumento do consumo de alimentos ultraprocessados, combinado com altera√ß√µes no estilo de vida e no ambiente, provavelmente contribuiu para o aumento de casos dessa doen√ßa entre os mais jovens ao longo das √∫ltimas d√©cadas.
‚è≥ Descubra o que est√° rolando por a√≠! Entre no canal da Catraca Livre no WhatsApp e receba novidades no celular. üì± O c√¢ncer pode crescer silenciosamente e, por isso, muitos casos em est√°gio inicial acabam detectados de forma ocasional, ap√≥s exames de rotina.
Quais s√£o os sintomas iniciais do c√¢ncer de intestino? Mesmo assim, alguns sintomas de que algo est√° errado podem surgir e geralmente incluem:
sangue nas fezes; ir mais ou ir menos ao banheiro sem causa aparente; altera√ß√£o na forma das fezes; c√≥lica abdominal. Em est√°gios mais avan√ßados, a doen√ßa pode provocar anemia, perda de apetite, emagrecimento r√°pido e sem motivo, e tamb√©m cansa√ßo.
Diagn√≥stico e tratamento A detec√ß√£o da doen√ßa √© realizada atrav√©s da colonoscopia, um exame que permite visualizar a mucosa intestinal e identificar poss√≠veis inflama√ß√µes ou p√≥lipos. Caso se detecte alguma altera√ß√£o, o m√©dico pode realizar uma bi√≥psia para confirmar a presen√ßa de c√¢ncer.
A primeira linha de tratamento para o c√¢ncer colorretal √© a cirurgia, na qual o tumor e a parte afetada do intestino s√£o removidos.
Al√©m disso, a quimioterapia, a imunoterapia e outros tratamentos podem ser necess√°rios.
Como prevenir o c√¢ncer de intestino? Embora n√£o seja poss√≠vel garantir a preven√ß√£o do c√¢ncer, adotar um estilo de vida saud√°vel pode diminuir significativamente o risco.
Uma dieta equilibrada, rica em frutas e vegetais, menos consumo de carne vermelha, evitar o tabaco e o √°lcool, e praticar exerc√≠cios f√≠sicos regularmente podem fazer uma grande diferen√ßa.
Al√©m disso, √© fundamental salientar que a realiza√ß√£o dos exames de rastreamento se faz imprescind√≠vel para aumentar as chances de sucesso do tratamento. O Minist√©rio da Sa√∫de aconselha que esse rastreamento seja feito a partir dos 50 anos.
A Catraca Livre tamb√©m alerta sobre os sintomas incomuns de c√¢ncer de intestino, clique aqui para acessar o conte√∫do .

author: @23WIFR
title: Benefits of therapy sessions with dogs
text: Benefits of therapy sessions with dogs ROCKFORD, Ill. (WIFR) - Bettering the mental health of patients, therapy dogs can play a key role in providing comfort for a multitude of different health challenges. Some patients diagnosed with ADHD, PTSD, depression, bipolar disorder and Alzheimer‚Äôs disease can benefit from the presence of a therapy dog or companion animal. April 11 is Dog Therapy Appreciation Day, celebrating the hard work put forth by dogs since the first therapy dog program was established in 1976. Thomas Shook is the founder of [815 Paws](https://www.815paws.org/), a therapy dog organization based in Rockford. Shook says traditional forms of therapy can be beneficial, but dog therapy helps patients feel calmer. ‚ÄúA lot of times, the dogs will pick up on something going on with the client before the actual therapist will,‚Äù Shook said. ‚ÄúWhen you add the dog, like Mya, laying on the ground, she would actually get up and maybe go over to the client.‚Äù Copyright 2024 WIFR. All rights reserved.

author: @nbc15_madison
title: Winter storm provides perfect snow, snowmobilers say
text: Winter storm provides perfect snow, snowmobilers say MADISON, Wis. (WMTV) - Dane County snowmobilers hit the trails for the first time in 2024, and they call this week‚Äôs snowfall the perfect winter storm for trail riding. The Dane County Snowmobile Club puts in hours of volunteer work to make sure the trails are ready when the first big winter storm hits southern Wisconsin. ‚ÄùOur rule of thumb is six inches of snow and 32 degrees,‚Äù Dane County Council of Snowmobile Clubs Director Sam Landes said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs as perfect as I‚Äôve seen it in a long time because you get the wet, heavy snow that you can now pack down. We got a couple of inches blowing last night, and the guys were all out padding. So they‚Äôre all out smoothing stuff.‚Äù Sam rides snowmobiles with his family. On Saturday, he hit the trails for the first time of the year with his son Chad Landes and his granddaughters. ‚ÄùIt feels great. It‚Äôs almost like a kid waiting for a snow day,‚Äù Chad said. ‚ÄùIt‚Äôs a different kind of way to explore the state of Wisconsin like you‚Äôve not been able to see before.‚Äù Sam said safety is the most important thing for snowmobilers to think about. He said anyone born after 1985 needs to get certified, people should stay on marked trails and check trail conditions before heading out. ‚ÄùMake sure you understand those winds are going to be high so you want to make sure you‚Äôre playing it safe. You have your snowmobile safety,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúSo, you want to have all that stuff, and be safe, and realize that you could come up with something that you might have to turn around and go a different direction on. So, you want to just be certain you‚Äôre careful and safe.‚Äù There are 605 snowmobile clubs in Wisconsin, and 15 of the clubs are in Dane County. [Click here](https://www.nbc15.com/page/find-nbc15-news-wherever-you-are/) to download the WMTV15 News app or our WMTV15 First Alert weather app. Copyright 2024 WMTV. All rights reserved.

author: Our Editors
title: 9 Best Probiotics For Gut Health (Seed v Ritual v AG1)
text:
9 Best Probiotics For Gut Health (Seed v Ritual v AG1)
The Good Trade editors endorse products we‚Äôve personally researched, tested, and genuinely love. Learn more about our methodology and business model here.
We‚Äôve researched and tested dozens of probiotics for women‚Äôs gut health ‚Äîthese are our top picks for their natural, high quality ingredients and potent AFUs/CFUs.
Looking to support your gut health? Us too. Gut health is essential to wellness and feeling good in our bodies, as ‚Äúour microbiome‚Ä¶helps to shape our immune system,‚Äù according to transplant gastroenterologist Dr. Shilpa Ravella. Since a large portion of our immune system lives in the gut, it‚Äôs important to nourish our gut microbiota through promoting antibodies production, and reducing inflammation‚Äîall of which probiotics do! Probiotics support our gut health in more ways than one. From balancing bacteria in the gut, to improving digestive health, managing IBS, and even mood and cognitive function, a high quality probiotic goes a long way.
Seed vs. AG1 vs. Ritual ‚Äì What makes a good probiotic?
With all the information out there on the types and strains of probiotics that help support our gut needs, it can be confusing to know where to start. That‚Äôs why when choosing the best probiotic for gut health, it‚Äôs important to consider the following:
-Strain Type & Diversity: A good probiotic should specify which strains are in their product, as some strains can support certain health needs better or have unique properties and benefits. Generally, a probiotic with a highly diverse strain composition is more beneficial to gut heath.
‚ÄìShelf Stability & Survivability: Since probiotics are living organisms, they won‚Äôt be of much help if they are not active. A good probiotic will list whether it‚Äôs shelf-stable or requires refrigeration (both options are good!), and its guaranteed potency through its expiry date. Also ensuring the probiotic you choose offers a timed release or enteric-coating is beneficial, as these both protect probiotics from harsh stomach acids, which can reduce their effectiveness before they reach your intestines.
‚ÄìSynbiotic Formula: While most probiotics don‚Äôt contain pre- or post- biotics, formulas that do will help probiotics thrive, grow and remain active. (We‚Äôve included ones that do in this list!) With synbiotic formulas, you‚Äôll achieve better and more well-rounded support that assists in feeding the healthy bacteria in the gut and maintaining the integrity of the gut barrier.
‚ÄìAFU: While CFU is common in assessing how many living and reproducing microorganisms are in a probiotic supplement, AFU offers a more functional and accurate representation of microorganism count. AFU assesses how many living and metabolically active cells exist using a fluorescent dye test, whereas CFU involves counting colonies through a culture sample (which thrives only in certain conditions). Through this assessment, AFU measurements provide valuable insight into the viability and ability of microorganisms to survive under different conditions, which is a crucial factor in the effectiveness of a good probiotic. It‚Äôs important to note that neither one is necessarily better than the other, simply AFU provides a much more accurate snapshot of microorganism count than CFU.
Now, when it comes to effective probiotic options, Seed, AG1, and Ritual are popular choices on the market, but how do they compare? When it comes to strain type and diversity, Seed takes the lead with 24 probiotic strains that support digestive, skin, and cardiovascular health. Both Seed and Ritual are shelf-stable and offer delayed release, and all three formulas offer synbiotic properties. When it comes to AFU/CFU count, Seed has 53.6 billion AFU, Ritual has 11 billion CFU, and AG1 has 7.2 billion CFU.
Ritual is a great choice if your looking for daily gut support, while Seed is an option to turn to if you require a higher level of digestive and whole body support. We recommend AG1 if you‚Äôre always on the go and have a harder time meeting your nutrition goals as it contains over 75 ingredients to help support whole body health, in addition to probiotics. When comparing these three products, there are areas where one thrives over another‚Äìhowever we agree that each of these brands offers high quality formulas that will benefit your gut health needs.
In this guide, we‚Äôve covered the ins and outs of what these popular probiotics offer, as well as a few more of our favorite brands, so you can make the most informed decision for your health.
Our criteria:
- NATURAL, HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS | Each of these probiotics is made from ingredients that are naturally sourced, tested, and proven effective. No fillers, gums, or binders here!
- AFFORDABILITY | We‚Äôve offered a variety of options at various price points, while prioritizing more affordable choices for better accessibility.
- ACTIVE FLUORESCENT UNITS (AFU) | We‚Äôve done the work for you by including the best brands that provide detailed CFU count (and AFU where available).
The below brands are the best of the best when it comes to science-backed and clinically proven pre-, pro- and postbiotics. From third-party testing to sustainable production to superb ingredients that ensure our guts are healthy and happy, these gut health supplements keep everything regular and flowing. üòâ
If you‚Äôre look to up your supplement routine to more natural products with organic ingredients, we‚Äôve got you covered with our guides on best magnesium supplements, fiber supplements, and women‚Äôs multivitamins to help keep your health in tip-top shape.
**This review is not health advice. Please talk to your OBGYN or healthcare provider before adding any supplements to your diet.
Best Overall | Best Powdered Probiotic | Most Affordable
1. Seed
Clean Ingredients | Vegan; free from gluten, dairy, soy, nut, shellfish, corn, & sesame; glyphosate/AMPA-free, no binders or preservatives; prop-65 compliant
AFU (Active Fluorescent Units) | 53.6 billion
Price | $50/month
Seed‚Äòs clinically-researched daily synbiotic (probiotic + prebiotic) is formulated with strains to support digestive health, gut barrier integrity, gut immune function, and even cardiovascular and dermatological health. The brand has set the bar incredibly high with production standards, testing, biofermentation, and survivability‚ÄîSeed‚Äôs ViaCap technology ensures the probiotic makes it to your colon while still alive. This is the best of the best when it comes to caring for your gut health and microbiome. Even better, the brand has impressive sustainability initiatives and subscription options (monthly refills come in biofilm sachets!) so you never miss your daily dose.
Customer Review | ‚ÄúI have to tell you, this is the first probiotic I have ever taken that actually does something for me. From early on I have noticed a difference in my elimination and I have always had an ongoing problem, never regular. So this is very exciting for me to have a product that actually works!‚Äù ‚Äì Anonymous
2. Ritual
Clean Ingredients | Vegan; gluten-free & allergen-friendly; non-GMO; third-party tested
CFU (Colony Forming Units) | 11 billion
Price | $54/month
Ritual‚Äòs Synbiotic+ is a 3-in-1 clinically-studied prebiotics, probiotics, and postbiotics formula to support a balanced gut microbiome. It includes 11b CFUs for digestive support, plus two of the world‚Äôs most clinically studied probiotic strains. We love that Ritual uses Made Traceable¬Æ ingredients and that you only have to take one capsule‚Äîwhich is formulated as a delayed-release capsule so it reaches your colon while still alive. Take one a day to support your gut health, gut barrier, and immune system.
Customer Review | ‚ÄúThis product has completely changed my gut health. From suffering for nearly 4 years with bad digestive issues, this was my last ditch effort before doing exploratory scans and colonoscopies. Decided to begin this product in October and had a colonoscopy scheduled for January. Ended up canceling the colonoscopy because this product cured all my issues. I haven‚Äôt had but maybe two or three ‚Äúflare ups‚Äù (diarrhea) in almost 4 months. I am a true believer of this product and will continue to put forth the money to be better...This was a life changing product and I am so happy to have found a product that is non invasive and actually WORKS!‚Äù ‚Äì DP (Read all reviews.)
3. AG1
Clean Ingredients | Vegan; organic ingredients; non-GMO; free of fillers & preservatives; free from gluten, corn, eggs, peanuts, dairy, & animal by-products
CFU (Colony Forming Units) | 7.2 billion
Price | $99/month; discounted subscriptions available (20%+ off)
Our editors are big fans of AG1 (formerly Athletic Greens) for daily greens, vitamins and nutrients, and‚Äîyes‚Äîpre- and probiotics. (Read our review here!) One yummy scoop of this green powder (mix with water or add to your morning smoothie) includes 75 superpower ingredients for gut and whole body health‚Äîincluding nutrient-dense extracts, herbs, and antioxidants, digestive enzymes, phytonutrients, multiminerals, and so much more. We love that AG1 can be enjoyed as a morning beverage, especially if you have difficulty swallowing pills. The travel packs are an easy option to take on the go so we never miss our daily serving.
Customer Review | ‚ÄúFor years it bothered me that I couldn‚Äôt get enough of the foods I needed to give me the health my body deserved, and now with a toddler, it was even harder. Until I was introduced to AG1. I was amazed how easily it fit into my routine, drinking this delicious combination before my daughter wakes up, and getting on with my day .‚Äù Tina M., Professional long distance runner https://athleticgreens.sjv.io/c/274622/1087107/13896?subId1=wel-web--&u=https%3A%2F%2Fdrinkag1.com%2Fabout-ag1%2Freviews%2Fctr.)
4. Perelel
Clean Ingredients | Gluten-free, soy-free, dairy-free; non-GMO; third-party tested
CFU (Colony Forming Units) | 10 billion
Price | $28/month; discounted subscriptions available (10% off)
Perelel is the brand we love for our conception journey, whether we‚Äôre trying to get pregnant, currently growing a baby, or recovering from postpartum. Founded specifically by an OBGYN, the brand has a line of prenatal vitamins with bioavailable ingredients specific to each trimester (including a men‚Äôs multi-pack), as well as a daily probiotic for maximum gut support. Thanks to a Carbonfree partnership, Perelel supports carbon offset projects and uses eco-friendly packaging for its supplements, which is better for you and the planet.
Customer Review | ‚ÄúProbiotics can help support optimal gut microbiome health at all stages of life‚Äîfrom preconception to postpartum gut health is critically important. I especially love Perelel‚Äôs Daily Probiotic because it was formulated with specific strains for women and pregnancy.‚Äù ‚Äì Dr. Caitlin O., ND & Midwife https://perelelhealth.sjv.io/c/274622/1911933/22949?subId1=wel-web--&u=https%3A%2F%2Fperelelhealth.com%2F.)
5. Needed.
Clean Ingredients | Non-GMO; allergen friendly; third-party tested
CFU (Colony Forming Units) | 30 billion
Price | $60/month; discounted subscriptions available (10%+ off)
Needed. is another one of our editor-tested and approved brands for daily vitamins, including prenatals and probiotics that provide microbiome support for you and your baby. Formulated in partnership with leading perinatal and microbiome experts, this pre- and probiotic includes clinically studied spore-forming and non-spore-forming strains and supports key perinatal needs like vaginal balance, digestive comfort, and iron absorption. We love the subscription options and the various plans to save on monthly supplies of supplements for both partners.
Customer Review | ‚ÄúThis pre/probiotic has helped so much! My baby started getting colicky and had issues with constipation being breastfed. Her symptoms have resolved, and she‚Äôs back on a schedule for regular bowel movements now. I will definitely not let this run out before reordering!‚Äù ‚Äì Atlanta H. https://needed.sjv.io/c/274622/1654614/19222?subId1=wel-web--&u=https%3A%2F%2Fthisisneeded.com%2Fproducts%2Fprenatal-pre-probiotic.)
6. Ora
Clean Ingredients | Dairy-free, gluten-free, soy-free; non-GMO; organic; vegan
CFU (Colony Forming Units) | 20 billion
Price | $50/month; discounted subscriptions available (20% off)
If you‚Äôre in search of a powdered probiotic, you‚Äôre in luck‚ÄîOra‚Äôs Trust Your Gut shelf-stable vegan probiotic power is a synbiotic powerhouse. With 7 highly-researched probiotic strains alongside natural prebiotic fiber from organic apples and Jerusalem artichokes, this probiotic will help you regulate your digestive system and improve bloating in a matter of days. Be sure to start slow (half a scoop for the first week or two), to minimize any sensitivity as your gut adjusts to the new strains. If you are taking or recently took antibiotics, Ora is also a great choice to replenish your gut microbiome. Mix it with your smoothie, water or sprinkle it on your food‚Äìthe options are endless!
Customer Review | ‚ÄúWhat a great product. Finally, probiotics where I don‚Äôt have to swallow capsules. Very pure, tastes great, and is a supper support for gut health. Bravo Ora! Another great product.‚Äù ‚Äì Pamela G. https://oraorganic.pxf.io/c/274622/1196455/14984?subId1=wel-web--&u=https%3A%2F%2Fora.organic%2Fproducts%2Forganic-probiotic-and-prebiotics-powder.)
7. Garden of Life
Clean Ingredients | No binders, fillers or carriers; whole food vitamins; non-GMO; dairy-free & soy-free options available
CFU (Colony Forming Units) | 50‚Äì85 billion
Price | $29‚Äì$60/month; discounted subscriptions available (15%+ off & free shipping)
There‚Äôs a probiotic for everybody with Garden of Life‚Äôs extensive collection. Whether you‚Äôre looking for UTI support, a daily synbiotic formula, or one for ages 50+, Garden of Life‚Äôs probiotics provide nourishing care for both your gut and whole body health. With options boasting an impressive 50‚Äì85 billion CFU with some products including up to 33 strains, this potent formula is made to cover all the bases and offer high-level digestive fuel. We love that these formulas include whole food vitamins, minerals, and prebiotics to benefit overall colon and immune health. (Some are also Dr. formulated!) What more could you ask for?
Customer Review | ‚ÄúI love that GOL has products for women over 50, and these have been a great addition to my health regimine! After dealing with some GI issues early this year, my doctor suggested adding a probiotic to my daily supplements. I really believe these have helped to heal my gut and provide some things I was missing. Thank you GOL for your superb products and reasonable prices!‚Äù -Tammy G https://www.gardenoflife.com/products/our-probiotics.)
8. Thorne
Clean Ingredients | Gluten-free, dairy-free, soy-free
CFU (Colony Forming Units) | 10 billion
Price | $35/month; discounted subscriptions available (20% off)
For vaginal and urinary tract needs, consider Thorne‚Äôs daily probiotic, made with clinically-studied strains and 10 billion cultures. This minimal formula is designed to target those who experience vaginal and urinary issues. This includes unwanted yeast growth, UTIs, and other vaginal bacterial imbalances. With daily use, this supplement promotes healthy microflora populations in the gut and balanced vaginal pH levels. No more itching and discomfort here! Thorne supplements are manufactured in the USA and according to third-parties is the ‚Äò#1 most highly recommended brand by Healthcare practitioners‚Äô.
Customer Review | ‚ÄúI have been taking this for about three months. Prior to taking this, I was having almost monthly yeast infections. Since taking this, I have had none. Love this product!‚Äù ‚Äì Natasha P. https://www.thorne.com/products/dp/women-s-daily-probiotic.)
9. MaryRuth Organics
Clean Ingredients | Vegan; dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, soy-free; organic; non-GMO
CFU (Colony Forming Units) | 5‚Äì63 billion
Price | $25‚Äì$50/month; discounted subscriptions available (10% off)
Prebiotics, probiotics, and postbiotics unite in MaryRuth Organics high quality daily supplements. Each probiotic product goes to work on different needs, with the overall goal of helping boost our digestive health. If capsules are tough to swallow, MaryRuth offers probiotics in powder, liquid and even gummies form, which is perfect for getting your daily dose in your preferred method! You‚Äôll also find options for postnatal care, hair, skin and nail health, and even added turmeric for its anti-inflammatory properties. No matter what option you go for, every product is vegan with many USDA organic options. It‚Äôs no wonder MaryRuth‚Äôs has over 12,000 5-star reviews!
Customer Review | ‚ÄúI was looking for something that was a probiotic, but also helped me with vaginal health and gut health and so far this has been great! I will keep buying.‚Äù ‚Äì Abigail B. (Read all reviews.)

author: Daniela Tost√≥n
title: El tiempo en L' Hospitalet de Llobregat para ma√±ana: alerta amarilla por lluvias y fen√≥menos costeros
text: El tiempo en L' Hospitalet de Llobregat para ma√±ana: alerta amarilla por lluvias y fen√≥menos costeros Conoce la previsi√≥n de AEMET para hoy, con detalles sobre el tiempo y posibles lluvias L' Hospitalet de Llobregat estar√° ma√±ana s√°bado en alerta amarilla por lluvias y fen√≥menos costeros. De acuerdo a la previsi√≥n de la [Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET)](http://www.aemet.es/es/eltiempo/prediccion/avisos?w=mna), la localidad vivir√° una jornada caracterizada por multitud de variaciones: un ambiente de abundantes nubes con lluvia dominar√° las primeras horas del d√≠a, mientras que se reducir√° la nubosidad a partir de las 06:00 horas y se incrementar√° la nubosidad hasta concluir con cielos cubiertos con lluvia. As√≠, se producir√°n lluvias d√©biles que podr√≠an dejar alrededor de unos 0.4 litros por metro cuadrado, aproximadamente a las 05:00, mientras que sobre las 16:00 se suceder√°n 0.1 litros. Asimismo, hay muchas posibilidades de que aparezcan tormentas en ambas franjas horarias. Se esperan pocos cambios de temperaturas con respecto a los registros de hoy, alcanzando los 21 grados de m√°xima y los 16 de m√≠nima . En esta fecha vendr√°n vientos flojos de direcci√≥n nordeste. A continuaci√≥n se indica la evoluci√≥n semanal del tiempo en L' Hospitalet de Llobregat; concretamente, a la izquierda se muestra el estado del cielo de cada d√≠a junto a la probabilidad de precipitaciones, seguido de la temperatura m√≠nima y m√°xima que registrar√°n los term√≥metros. El tiempo del domingo Por otro lado, pasado ma√±ana se espera un domingo encapotado con lluvia desde la madrugada hasta mitad del d√≠a, aunque la nubosidad se reducir√° a partir de las 12:00. Las [temperaturas m√°ximas](https://www.elconfidencial.com/tecnologia/ciencia/2018-09-24/cambio-climatico-warmer-europe-datos_1619178/) en L' Hospitalet de Llobregat ser√°n muy parecidas a las de ma√±ana y la m√≠nima se mover√° en torno a los 17 grados . El viento soplar√° muy flojo, con direcci√≥n nordeste. El tiempo del lunes Para el lunes hay probabilidad, aunque baja, de precipitaciones, en tanto que durante la primera mitad del d√≠a predominar√° un panorama muy nuboso y, hasta mediod√≠a, el panorama evolucionar√° hacia una menor nubosidad . La temperatura m√°xima apenas sufrir√° cambios (22 grados) , pero los valores m√≠nimos seguir√°n en torno a los 17. Por otra parte, soplar√°n ligeras brisas de direcci√≥n este. * Datos del tiempo en L' Hospitalet de Llobregat con informaci√≥n elaborada utilizando, entre otras, la obtenida de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET). En cualquier caso, esta informaci√≥n debe considerarse provisional a la espera de pr√≥ximas actualizaciones. L' Hospitalet de Llobregat estar√° ma√±ana s√°bado en alerta amarilla por lluvias y fen√≥menos costeros. De acuerdo a la previsi√≥n de la [Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET)](http://www.aemet.es/es/eltiempo/prediccion/avisos?w=mna), la localidad vivir√° una jornada caracterizada por multitud de variaciones: un ambiente de abundantes nubes con lluvia dominar√° las primeras horas del d√≠a, mientras que se reducir√° la nubosidad a partir de las 06:00 horas y se incrementar√° la nubosidad hasta concluir con cielos cubiertos con lluvia.

author: lesoir.com
title: Climat : la hausse du niveau des oc√©ans a connu ¬´ un bond ¬ª entre 2022 et 2023 - Le Soir
text:
Le principal responsable est le changement climatique, qui implique la fonte de glace (calotte glaciaire, glaciers) mais aussi l‚Äôexpansion des oc√©ans sous l‚Äôeffet de l‚Äôabsorption de chaleur. AFP Par Belga Publi√© le 22/03/2024 √† 06:59 Temps de lecture: 1 min L a hausse moyenne du niveau des oc√©ans dans le monde a √©t√© de 0,76 centim√®tre entre 2022 et 2023, un ¬´ bond important ¬ª par rapport √† d‚Äôautres ann√©es, d√ª √† la fois au ph√©nom√®ne El Nino et au changement climatique, a indiqu√© jeudi la Nasa. Le niveau des oc√©ans a en moyenne gagn√© 9,4 cm depuis 1993, selon ces donn√©es fond√©es sur des observations satellites.
Le principal responsable est le changement climatique, qui implique la fonte de glace (calotte glaciaire, glaciers) mais aussi l‚Äôexpansion des oc√©ans sous l‚Äôeffet de l‚Äôabsorption de chaleur. L‚Äô√©l√©vation du niveau de la mer se fait de plus en plus rapidement : son rythme a plus que doubl√© entre 1993 (0,18 cm par an) et actuellement (0,42 cm).
¬´ Le rythme actuel signifie que nous sommes en chemin pour ajouter 20 cm suppl√©mentaires au niveau mondial des oc√©ans d‚Äôici 2050 ¬ª, a d√©clar√© dans un communiqu√© Nadya Vinogradova Shiffer, directrice de l‚Äô√©quipe en charge de ce dossier √† la Nasa. Cela va ¬´ accro√Ætre la fr√©quence et les cons√©quences des inondations √† travers le monde ¬ª, a-t-elle soulign√©.
Entre 2022 et 2023, la hausse observ√©e revient √† verser dans les oc√©ans un quart du lac Sup√©rieur, le plus grand des Grands lacs d‚ÄôAm√©rique du Nord. Cette hausse repr√©sente un peu moins de quatre fois le niveau observ√© l‚Äôann√©e pr√©c√©dente (+0,21 cm entre 2021 et 2022). Cette ann√©e-l√†, le ph√©nom√®ne la Nina √©tait alors √† l‚Äô≈ìuvre.
√Ä lire aussi Le vrai ou faux : le r√©chauffement en 2023 a-t-il √©t√© exceptionnel ?
¬´ Pendant la Nina, de la pluie qui tombe normalement dans les oc√©ans tombe √† la place sur les terres, ce qui enl√®ve temporairement de l‚Äôeau des oc√©ans ¬ª, a expliqu√© Josh Willis, chercheur sur le sujet √† la Nasa.
Mais ¬´ durant les ann√©es El Nino, beaucoup de la pluie tombant normalement sur les terres finit dans l‚Äôoc√©an, ce qui rel√®ve temporairement le niveau des oc√©ans ¬ª, a-t-il ajout√©.
